column1: # Educational dataset for demonstration purposes - not for investment advice
# - bond_id: Unique identifier for each bond (e.g.
# - issuer: Name of the organization issuing the bond
# - country_code: ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code (3-letter code)
# - issue_date: Date when the bond was issued (YYYY-MM-DD)
# - maturity_date: Date when the bond matures (YYYY-MM-DD)
# - amount_usd_millions: Bond amount in millions of USD
# - coupon_rate: Annual coupon rate as a percentage
# - use_of_proceeds: Category of green project funded by the bond
# - certification: Green bond certification standard or framework
